question: Who has received MMA Amalgamations Business Leadership Award 2019 in Chennai?
explanation: Azim Premji was conferred the 19th edition of Madras Management Association\'s Amalgamations Business Leadership Award . The award was conferred to him \"in recognition of his ability to build a business with impeccable integrity and uncompromising ethics, transforming Wipro into a global IT powerhouse and putting India on the world map as a software nation\".
